item.description:
Okay, so I'm pretty late sending out this announcement, but better now than tomorrow or the next day or (heaven forbid) Friday night when no one is even at their computers.

In any case, I'm hosting game day once again at my house in Concord, NH, and as always I have a number of new games on hand to try out, including two dozen from the Spiel 09 game convention in Essen, Germany. My main goal is to play Gonzaga at least once more along with the new Uwe Rosenberg title At the Gates of Loyang. Plenty of other games on hand, so I hope you'll swing by to play. Start time is noon, and we'll likely play until 7-8 pm.

RSVP with an arrival time if you're in, and feel free to suggest games that you want to play.

Eric
item.name: Gaming in Concord, NH
